sections.title: Cookies on the NHS website
paragraphs: We've put some small files called cookies on your device to make our site work.

We'd also like to use analytics cookies. These collect feedback and send information about how our site is used to services called Adobe Analytics, Adobe Target, Qualtrics Feedback and Google Analytics. We use this information to improve our site.
Let us know if this is OK. We'll use a cookie to save your choice. You canread more about our cookiesbefore you choose.
You can change your cookie settings at any time using ourcookies page.
Information for people who are approaching the end of their life and people who want to plan for their end of life care.

sections.title: What end of life care involves
paragraphs: An introduction to end of life care, including what it is, when it starts and who provides it

sections.title: What to expect from end of life care
paragraphs: Information about the quality of end of life care you should expect and what to do if you have any concerns

sections.title: Where you can have end of life care
paragraphs: Information about where you can have end of life care, including at home, in hospital, in a care home or in a hospice

sections.title: Planning ahead
paragraphs: Advice about planning for end of life care, including how to let people know what care you want to receive

sections.title: Your wellbeing
paragraphs: Information to help you cope during end of life care, including how your symptoms might change and what financial support you can get

sections.title: Video: End of life care
paragraphs: In this video, a family share their experience of end of life care for a wife and mother.
